mapper.insert: insert into detail_port_monthly(site, time, type, indicator, value) values (#{departName}, #{time}, #{type}, #{indicator}, #{value})

insert into detail_data_collect(collect_date, collect_time, collect_point, depart_name, test_index, test_value, is_ok, static_year_month, static_year, static_month,standard_type,standard_max) values
(#{item.collectDate}, #{item.collectTime}, #{item.collectPoint}, #{item.departName}, #{item.testIndex}, #{item.testValue}, #{item.isOk}, #{item.staticYearMonth}, #{item.staticYear}, #{item.staticMonth},#{item.standardType},#{item.standardMax})
